ygData.subject: RE: Faction and Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard there was only one way to increase faction with the SKs in Neriak. That is to kill the Wood Elf captives in Crushbone. ... From: rich.hitz@att.net
ygData.messageBody:
I heard there was only one way to increase faction with the SKs in Neriak.
That is to kill the Wood Elf captives in Crushbone.


-----Original Message-----
From: rich.hitz@... [mailto:rich.hitz@...]
Sent: 14 September 1999 15:44
To: Shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Faction and Quests


From: rich.hitz@...

Tom,
Thank you for not including the entire digest in your
post!


1 factor I thought was hindering me for faction and
training in Neriak was the fact that Cronik worships
Cazic-Thule. The Troll SK guild in Neriak is obviously
Innoruuk, but I'm not sure that section's code is active
anymore. I say thiis because the Shaman merchants that
the EQSS map shows in Neriak Foriegn Quarter are not
there anymore.
No one in the DE Necro/SK guildhall will give me quests
either. They all sputter something about "in the
persence of The Dead. I shall strike you down." and then
just stand there.

Possible solution:
1) To gain faction in Neriak give 1 bottle of Red Wine
to the Scribe. This gives minor XP and faction with
guards and merchants. Not sure about any other faction
adjustments as I have yet to do this one. A guild member
told me abut it. This is like the Give the Dwarf an Ale
to raise faction in Freeport (if I have the right
quest... I hate Freeport!).
2) To raise faction in Grobb with Night Keep SK guild
give Hukulk 4 bone chips not stacked. Not sure what this
will accomplish with non-trolls. I got a rusty 2 hand
sword and guild faction. May try it and see. This will
lower faction with Da'Bashers so con the guards first to
see how they react to you. I have done this many times
(over 30) and they /con apprehensively to me. I have no
idea what it was before though.
3)To raise faction with Da'Bashers (and lower it with
Night Keep) give one of the leaders (no sure who) two
tadpole flesh and an eye (I think).

And now a Quest Question.

What Mob drops a Ruby that Lyguna is looking to collect?
I know the item does not say when right clicked on it
what Lyguna's description is. I hear that a Necro in
Feerot drops one. Is this correct? Any info would be
helpful.

Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."



>From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>
>
>Brian-
> About faction...If you can do anything abou this
>one thing i am sure a LOT of sks would love is if we
>could train in all the sk guilds. I have only been to
>4 guilds(i am a dark elf) neriak, freeport, grobb, and
>oggok. I can only train in neriak and freeport. i do
>not understand why i cannot train in/have access to
>the quests in the sk guilds in grobb and oggok.
>
>Tekman Hatebringer, 27th campaign
>House of Malice
>Rodcet Nife Server
>
